mapper.insert: INSERT INTO holding_requests(sender_id, receiver_id, book_id, parent_book_id, status_id, request_message) VALUES(#{senderId}, #{receiverId}, #{bookId}, #{parentBookId}, #{statusId}, #{requestMessage});
mapper.update: UPDATE holding_requests set status_id = #{statusId}, date_updated = now() WHERE id = #{holdingRequestId};
mapper.select: select hr.id, hr.sender_id, u.username as sender_name, hr.book_id, b.name as book_name, hr.status_id, hrst.name as ststus_name, hr.parent_book_id, bp.name as parent_book_name, coalesce(hr.request_message, '') as message, to_char(hr.date_created, 'dd.MM.yyyy HH24:MI') as date_created from holding_requests hr LEFT JOIN users u ON u.id = hr.sender_id LEFT JOIN books b ON b.id = hr.book_id LEFT JOIN books bp ON bp.id = hr.parent_book_id LEFT JOIN holding_request_status_types hrst ON hrst.id = hr.status_id where hr.receiver_id = #{userId} and hr.status_id = 1 order by date_created desc;

select hr.id, hr.sender_id, u.username as sender_name, hr.book_id, b.name as book_name, hr.status_id, hrst.name as ststus_name, hr.parent_book_id, bp.name as parent_book_name, coalesce(hr.request_message, '') as message, to_char(hr.date_created, 'dd.MM.yyyy HH24:MI') as date_created from holding_requests hr LEFT JOIN users u ON u.id = hr.sender_id LEFT JOIN books b ON b.id = hr.book_id LEFT JOIN books bp ON bp.id = hr.parent_book_id LEFT JOIN holding_request_status_types hrst ON hrst.id = hr.status_id where hr.receiver_id = #{userId} and (hr.status_id = 2 or hr.status_id = 4) order by date_created desc;
